remarks: The law of concretion.  Theorem 9.5 of [Quine] p. 61.  This version of ~ opelopab uses bound-variable hypotheses in place of distinct variable conditions."  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2013.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 18-Nov-2016.)
statement:
opelopabaf.x $e |- F/ x ps $.
opelopabaf.y $e |- F/ y ps $.
opelopabaf.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
opelopabaf.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
opelopabaf.3 $e |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
opelopabaf $p |- ( <. A , B >. e. { <. x , y >. | ph } <-> ps ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
